Action.author: tongliofcary
Action.body: Baohua, what do you suggest that we do here? Do you want simply move the document into a different location or re-work on other documents (where and which?) to reference the agent docs? I am not really sure what your intension is on this one, that is reason why I could not just move it in previous patch. If you can comment a bit on this issue, that will be really helpful. Thanks.

Action.author: tongliofcary
Action.body: ok. that makes sense to me. patch set will come up soon.
